text: Brener Antunes das Chagas or simply Brener (born 27 November 1975 in Itaboraí) is a former Brazilian football player. ==Honours== ;Vasco da Gama *Brasileirão champion: 1997 *Campeonato Carioca champion: 1998 *Copa Libertadores winner: 1998 ==References== Category:1975 births Category:People from Rio de Janeiro (state) Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:CR Vasco da Gama players Category:Rio Branco Atlético Clube players Category:FC Elista players Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Treze Futebol Clube players Category:Associação Atlética Internacional (Limeira) players Category:Guarani FC players Category:Avaí FC players Category:União Agrícola Barbarense Futebol Clube players Category:Macaé Esporte Futebol Clube players Category:Casimiro de Abreu Esporte Clube players Category:Shahzan Muda FC players Category:Expatriate footballers in Malaysia Category:River Atlético Clube players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Brener
